description: Application for certificate of lawfulness in respect of proposed following works;- The removal and disposal of all the existing timber framed double glazed casement windows to properties and communal areas and replacement with PVCu double glazed casement windows.  - The removal and disposal of all existing metal up and over garage doors and replacement with modern equivalent. - The removal and disposal of all existing composite type street accessible front door sets and replacement with modern equivalent. - The removal and disposal of all existing metal sliding glazed balcony doors and replacement with modern equivalent. - The removal and disposal of all existing timber glazed balcony doors and replacement with modern PVCu equivalent. - The removal and disposal of all existing timber glazed communal entrance and area doors and replacement with modern timber equivalent. - The removal and disposal of all existing PVCu rainwater goods and timber fascias and soffits and replacement with PVCu modern equivalent.
site_name: 42 - 114 Horseferry Road, 55 - 63 Narrow Street, London, E14
